short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listen to pronunciations easily as you browse the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select any English word to listen to its pronunciation.

Features:
* Easy to use - just hit the play button
* Choose between American and British pronunciation
* Slow down pronunciation speed
* View your most frequently listened to words
* View word definition and translation
* Perfectly fits for Android (via Kiwi Browser - https://kiwibrowser.com)

Powered by Oxford Languages
